title: The Demon
description: Billie's marriage is a pile of broken glass. Her husband, Otis, has been letting that whore Nell meet his needs. Making matters even worse, Nell fancies herself a prophet of God--and she's managed to convince Otis that Billie is possessed.  But Billie has a temper. And when Otis finally packs his bags and leaves, she heads over to Nell's house for an unforgettable showdown in this award-winning short story of anger, jealousy and possession in the American South.
author: Jackson Spencer Bell
